alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:57PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Todd and southern Bennett Counties through 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/... At 757 PM MDT/857 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Upper Cut Meat to 9 miles northwest of Merriman. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martin, Spring Creek, Tuthill, Harrington, LaCreek North Housing, Sunrise Housing, Vetal, Grass Mountain and Lacreek Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
